trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Learningway is worried one of his fellow Loporrits has met with misfortune.
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_TODO_00<tab>Investigate the water reserve in Greatest Endsvale.
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_TODO_01<tab>Fill the empty bottle with allegedly purifying water.
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_TODO_02<tab>Pour the allegedly purifying water on the shaky Loporrit.
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_TODO_03<tab>Report to Learningway.
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_LEARNINGWAY_000_000<tab>If you're not too busy, might I trouble you to look into something for me?
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_LEARNINGWAY_000_001<tab>I recently heard word that one of our fellows is acting strangely near one of the water reserves in Greatest Endsvale.
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_LEARNINGWAY_000_002<tab>Everyone knows that water is for our passengers-to-be, and if anything should happen to those reserves, it could ruin everything!
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_LEARNINGWAY_000_003<tab>I doubt they would talk to me, but I suspect they might be willing to confess their plans if you asked them. You'll help, won't you?
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_LEARNINGWAY_000_004<tab>The reserve you're looking for is on the northern end of Greatest Endsvale. Please hurry before they do anything foolish.
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_LEARNINGWAY_000_005<tab>I can't imagine what they would want with that water, but we can't risk anything happening to that reserve.
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248_000_010<tab>Wah! Who are you? What's the matter?
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248_000_011<tab>Suspicious? Me? But why? I haven't done anything wrong.
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248_000_012<tab>Urianger was teaching me about telling fortunes, and I've been trying to practice so I could show the others how it's done.

TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248_000_013<tab>In fact, I even made my own carrot cards, though they're not quite as fancy as Urianger's. I tried using them to see what good fortune will come to the people of Etheirys when they visit the moon, but...

TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248_000_014<tab>Maybe I did it wrong, but the cards had nothing good to say. I got the complete opposite. So I thought I'd try again after purifying myself in the water here.

TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248_100_014<tab>That is what your people do, yes? I read that it's possible to purify oneself using water, but I don't feel as if anything has changed. Maybe I've missed a step somewhere...
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248_000_015<tab>Oh! Could you draw the water for me? Coming from Hydaelyn's chosen, I'm sure it'd be the most purifyingest water ever!
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248_000_016<tab>All you have to do is fill this empty bottle with water and pour it on me. Please─the outcome of my carrot card reading is in your hands!
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248_000_017<tab>I know good fortune is in the cards for the people of Etheirys. I just need a little help proving it.
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248_000_020<tab>Ah, how refreshing. I feel like a brand-new Loporrit!

TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_FLUTTERINGLOPORRIT04248_000_021<tab>Already I can feel my spirit overflowing with good fortune. Time to have another look at those carrot cards, and see what awaits the people of Etheirys.
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_LEARNINGWAY_000_030<tab>Well? Did you find out what that good-for-nothing was up to?
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_LEARNINGWAY_000_031<tab>Oh! Really? Well, that's...actually quite admirable, making such efforts to understand the culture of Etheirys.
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_LEARNINGWAY_000_032<tab>That said, I'm not sure one is meant to redraw cards until they find a desired result. Or perhaps I misheard how fortune telling is meant to work...
TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_LEARNINGWAY_000_033<tab>...Maybe I should go and talk to them about that.

TEXT_AKTKZE009_04248_LEARNINGWAY_000_034<tab>Then again, there's been no harm done, and they mean well. Perhaps I'll discuss the finer points of card reading with them another day. Thank you for looking into this!
